visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts bar chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bar, Chart title: 'Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be the professions listed, Y-axis should have a range from 0 to 130000 with no title but an accessibility description of 'Gender distribution percentage'. The title and subtitle should be styled with default settings. Data series: Two series, one for 'Men' and one for 'Women', each with corresponding data points. Custom colors: Use '#b9d4f8' for 'Men' and '#f8b9d4' for 'Women'. Additional configurations: Include a tooltip that shows the series name and data point, and set the chart margins, background, and legend as per default settings.

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a bar chart that visualizes the gender distribution in the top 10 professions in Sweden for the age group 16-64 years in 2017. The chart is titled 'Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017' and includes a subtitle linking to the source of the data. The X-axis lists the professions, and the Y-axis ranges from 0 to 130,000, with an accessibility description for better understanding. The chart includes two data series: 'Men' and 'Women', each with specific data points. The tooltip displays the series name and data point, enhancing interactivity. The chart uses custom colors for the series, with '#b9d4f8' for 'Men' and '#f8b9d4' for 'Women', and includes additional configurations for plot options and accessibility.
